= Create Channel =

== Actions ==

 * Creates a channel for a specified spot with a given name.

== Request ==
<table cellspacing="4" border="0">
 <tr><td>*URL*</td><td>[http://fabienrenaud.com/armp/www/createChannel.php]</td></tr>
 <tr><td>*Method*</td><td>POST</td></tr>
 <tr><td>*Authentication*</td><td>Required.</td></tr>
</table>

Mandatory parameters:
 * {{{spotId}}} = _int_ > 0
 * name = _string_ The name of the channel.

Optional parameters:
 * _None_

== Response ==

That WS returns a XML file with the following tree:
 * *root*
  * *channel* | id | spotId
   * _channel elements_

The channel elements are the following:
<table cellspacing="4" border="0">
<tr><td>*name*</td><td>_string_</td><td>The name of the channel</td></tr>
<tr><td>*user*</td><td>_string_</td><td>The name of the user who created the channel</td></tr>
<tr><td>*genre*</td><td>_string_</td><td>The main genre of the channel</td></tr>
<tr><td>*musics*</td><td>_int_</td><td>The count of musics in the channel</td></tr>
<tr><td>*creation*</td><td>_int_</td><td>A unix timestamp date of the creation of the channel</td></tr>
<tr><td>*update*</td><td>_int_</td><td>A unix timestamp date of the last update of the channel</td></tr>
</table>

=== Sample ===

{{{
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<root>
  <channel id="9" spotId="1">
    <name>New Chan</name>
    <user>MyUser</user>
    <genre>None</genre>
    <musics>0</musics>
    <creation>1300717041</creation>
    <update>1300717041</update>
  </channel>
  <logged>1</logged>
  <status>1</status>
</root>
}}}
